None.Name: Tormenting
None.Description: Evil aura that deals 40 damage to hostile and friendly units in a 20m radius every second.

None.Name: Malicious Joy
None.Description: Every 6 seconds, tower teleports the enemy unit that has moved farthest away back to itself. Has a long range of 40m.

Three.Name: Malicious Joy
Three.Description: Every 6 seconds, tower teleports the enemy unit that has moved farthest away back to itself. Has a long range of 40m.

en.Description: Malicious Joy: Units will be teleported back 2s faster

de.Description: Malicious Joy: Units will be teleported back 2s faster

ru.Description: Malicious Joy: Units will be teleported back 2s faster

Extra.en: Units need to be outside of Tormenting range before being teleported back. Malicious Joy's cooldown starts after its last activation,  not after the unit has left the area.
Extra.de: Units need to be outside of Tormenting range before being teleported back. Malicious Joy's cooldown starts after its last activation,  not after the unit has left the area.
Extra.ru: Units need to be outside of Tormenting range before being teleported back. Malicious Joy's cooldown starts after its last activation,  not after the unit has left the area.
